marginalia.anchor_text: High and might [...] my sudden return.

substitution.copyText: And think it pastime: you shortly shall hear more. | I lov'd your father, and we love our self, | " And that I hope will teach you to imagine.
substitution.amendedText: I lov'd your father, and we love your self.--

substitution.copyText: King. From Hamlet? who brought them?
substitution.amendedText: King. From Hamlet! who brought them?

substitution.copyText: They were given me by Claudio, he received them | Of him that brought them.
substitution.amendedText: They were given me by Claudio.

substitution.copyText: As how should it be so, how otherwise?
Wherein they say you shine; your sum of parts | Did not together pluck such envy from him
